name: Extreme Car Challenge 3D: Stunts Simulator
description:
City car stunts 3D - extreme top speed challenge! Drive cars, jet car, trucks or monster truck! Join crazy driving fun and become master of stunt tricks! Tap tap & dash!

Craft a car stunts legend
Monster stunt challenge! Arcade adventure game with exploration lite! Enjoy fancy 3D ride on highest speed! Tap tap to sides to swing and drift between obstacles. Dash ahead - top speed, no limit! Perform dangerous stunts on this car city trial race! Extreme driving challenge for fans of acrobatic tricks and… destruction! This arcade adventure game is not only for boys - girls can drive cars too! Endless highway or blocky traffic jammed city lane? Choose your sandbox playground! Tap the nitro button and make other racers furious! Perform high jumps from ramps and make fancy insane tricks in this extreme stunt simulation 3D game! Become the best freestyle stunt jumper and avoid destruction! Ride a car or truck like a pro!

Best free stunt driving adventure
Focus on stunts & tricks - it’s not a racing game! Many tracks to choose from, not only in city! Endless road for driving glory in a crazy stunt 3D sandbox world! Epic fancy extreme car jumper challenge! Free arcade adventure games for boys and girls with exploration lite sandbox experience! It’s just a stunt simulator, but a crashing can be real! Drive & ride! Avoid destruction from many traps and show mad skills! It’s easy to learn, but hard to master! With beautifully crafted 3D landscape it’s easy to lose the track in this sandbox world, but don’t drag along! Take a ride and dash to top speed! This arcade freestyle adventure game rewards only the bravest car stunt jumper! Crazy jumping game for boys and girls, kids and family alike! Fast dash & city smash! Pro riding challenge for free!

Top speed challenge for city cars stunts fans
Freestyle Mode will test your driving skills to the limit! Tap tap and take a ride to perform extreme stunt tricks! Insane monster stunts earn you stars and gold, but don’t forget to avoid traps: bombs, wreckages and more! Unlock more crazy fancy levels and enjoy exploration lite experience in this arcade game for boys and girls! Free driving jumper fun on traffic jammed city asphalt or sandy highway road - for everyone! Tap tap the nitro, jump from ramps and fly high in this extreme driving simulation! How much can you dash without destruction? Extreme freestyle stunts game! Don’t drag along - start your crazy fancy jumping adventure and drive cars and trucks in sandbox 3D world now!

CORE FEATURES:
Become the most skilled car jumper!
Choose your vehicle! Cars, jet car, trucks and even monster truck!
Monster driving challenge without limit!
Barrel or donut! Extreme stunts to make!
Tap tap the nitro!
One of the most realistic stunts simulator games ever!

UPCOMING FEATURES:
Multiplayer mode!
Co-op mode!
Story mode!
More cars to choose from!
Monster trucks!
Jet cars!
More customization options!
